title: Animated motion. Pt. 1
creator_credit: Grant Munro, Norman McLaren and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The first part of this series by Norman McLaren deals only with tempo. It starts by showing the disc travelling in one move (1/24 of a second) from A to B, and progressively demonstrates slower and slower tempos.
